text: Prime Evil may refer to: *Prime Evil (album), by Venom, 1989 *Prime Evil (EP), by Raymond Watts, 1997 *Prime Evil (anthology), a 1988 anthology of horror short stories *Prime Evil (Buffy novel), a 2000 Buffy the Vampire Slayer novel *Prime Evil, the primary villain in the animated series Ghostbusters * Eugene de Kock (born 1949), nicknamed Prime Evil, South African former police colonel and assassin ==See also== *Primevil (disambiguation) *Primeval (disambiguation)
title: Prime Evil
